text_block_list.text: A while later. I wanted to hear Agnes Digital out some more, so I went to look for her.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: …You there. What are you up to, looking all shifty? Are you perhaps, perish the thought, stalking Umamusume, in broad daylight?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! I kid, I kid. That'd make you a dead ringer for the "Umamusume-chan-loving trainer" Digital-kun's been talking about.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh, dear, it really is you? Well, well…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: If you're looking for Digital-kun, she's out right now. En route to the train station, by the look of it. I'd wager she's on the hunt for more Umamusume merch, as usual——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: …Hmm, a trainer seeking out Digital-kun, eh? Will she able to keep someone like that at arm's length? Fufu, how fascinating.
Following Agnes Tachyon's advice, I kept looking for Digital. And then——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ahh～…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Oh legs gliding upon verdant grass, full of elegance and grace… Oh legs pushing with force upon the earth, full of vim and vigor…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Which prints do I buy? ——A foolish question! I'm getting both, obviously!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, thou who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name! For granting me life in a world blessed with so many goddesses!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Yes—— I, Digitan, devote my youth to you, Umamusume-chans! I was wrong to even think about running with them!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Uh, whaddya want…? Whom…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Bwah…!? I- Th…!? Sori, but, did, yoo, purhaps, here, every, thing, eye, sed…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Well, you already overhead all that——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: But this is seriously the biggest of the biggest of big questions! Just think about it! Who am I!? That's RIGHT——!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——I am AGNES DIGITAL! The Umamusume who loves Umamusume-chans more than any other!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Do you really think I can just choose between turf Umamusume-chans and dirt Umamusume-chans?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: No way, no way, no freaking way!! It's just as impossible as playing the mandolin without a pick!!
choice_data_list: And that's why you won't run yourself?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Exaaactly. The perfect place for me is quietly revering my faves behind the monitor…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ahh… On that fateful day of my childhood, watching those Umamusume-chans on TV, just how moved I was… How could I ever forget…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Seeing the Umamusume-chans clash, each with her own feelings in tow… It wasn't just their brilliance that moved me…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: It was their "will"…! Their will made me think they were just so precious.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I was blessed enough to be born an Umamusume, too. ——And an Umamusume has to run!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: IThe race is the ultimate stage for Umamusume-chans to shine! And I wanted to see every last one of them shine as bright as they can! I wanted to support them with everything I had!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Even though choosing would force me to miss some of them. Even then…! …I steeled my will, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I enrolled at Tracen Academy. But when I took just one step on school grounds——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hee hee hee, hoo hoo hoo… Ahh, the air is brimming with Umamusume-chans' lovely laughter…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: My faves are here, flesh and blood! They're real… They're 3D… Their breathing, their heartbeats, their footsteps, I can hear them all up close!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, these aren't just pictures on a screen! They're the real Umamusume-chans of Tracen Academy… …When that realization hit me——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Oh, it blew my freaking mind!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: "I steeled my will"!? Are you kidding? My flimsy will wasn't worth squat!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Not when I got to see all my beloved Umamusume-chans in IRL HD…!! And to top it all off, I find out I've got the goods for both track types?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: There's just no way!! How the heck am I supposed to choose between turf and dirt?!!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Nay, the truest choice is not to choose at all!!! That is the way of the fan!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So I'm not going to choose!! I'm not going to run on EITHER track!!!!
She put it all out in the open. You could say she had nothing to hide. But——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So, what about you? Do you think you've got time to waste on little old me? Shouldn't you go give your attention to those other Umamusume-chans?
choice_data_list: (There's another way of looking at this…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Fu fu fu. Don't have a comeback, now do you? Well, then, I'll be off——
choice_data_list: ——You've got a stronger will than anyone else!
——You've got a stronger will than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ……What?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Uh, were you, perchance, not listening to what I said? I didn't even have the will to make that choice, you know?
choice_data_list:
No, you had the will to not make that 
choice!

No, you had the will to not make that 
choice!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Bwuh…?
I remembered—— Despite her small size, she showed tremendous strength on the dirt track.
And she ran nimbly across the turf, with just as much skill as she did on dirt.
She couldn't choose between them, so she gave it her all on both. So why not use that to her advantage!?——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ummmm… I, um, beg your pardon, but I understand not what you are saying here…
I explained my idea to her right away. Then——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: BWGHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!!!???
——A few days later. Word started to get around about a certain something.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, d'you hear? The thing with Digital…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I heard! But I still can't believe it. It really came out of nowhere…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I can't believe she registered for the both the turf and dirt Selection Races…!
